channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Uneven road surface, 3rd April
item.description:
The road surface has become very uneven as you leave the Elmbridge Court Roundabout on the A40 heading west towards Ross-on-Wye direction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extensive road damage and deep gullies that will catch a cycle wheel. The repair appears to have only addressed some of the original problem., 3rd April
item.description:
The left side of the road towards Gotherington, before the railway bridge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 3rd April
item.description:
28 day with road lane closure needed please replace x1 broken sunken dropped kerb stone 900x150x20 mm stats required best out of hours (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 3rd April
item.description:
Customer reports that there is a lane closure just off the Princess Elizabeth Way roundabout, at the location, which is causing traffic chaos [validated by One.Network]. There is no permit showing.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 3rd April
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 3rd April
item.description:
Customer reports that an advance warning sign at the location, for the closure on Old Gloucester Road, is obscuring motorist's view to the left when exiting Hayden Road in the direction of Aldi/Sainsbury's.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Trench across road getting deeper by the day, Cheltenham Road, Bishops Cleeve, 3rd April
item.description:
A trench across the whole width of the road is getting deeper each day, and is deeper than a golfball in 4 places across the road. What3Words location roughly ///light.unions.much. Vehicles are swerving into the coned area when possible to avoid the trench.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass verge is falling into ditch outside Willow Cottage. This has been reported before. Email from Nicki about riparian rights, but it is highways dude which is the problem., 3rd April
item.description:
Water in ditch is eroding grass verge. Highways put on slabs at neighbouring property (Brenzett). Water now coming down back of this slabs. We are keeping ditch clear, but this is being washed away especially with winter surge. Bank has also collapsed at Spring Cottage and all the debris is washing down. Nicki Kelly emailed us 3/12/2024 but now can’t reply to her on Highwsys Customer Service email address. Email if you need more details.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 14 new Streetlights not working since November 2024, 3rd April
item.description:
There are a total of 14 Streetlights not working around the Manor Road / Runnings Road junction in Cheltenham. These new columns were installed October / November 2024 and have never worked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole up against a rubber “sleeping policeman “ ramp, 2nd April
item.description:
Turning into Bath Terrace off the Bath Road towards car park. Large pothole a butting rubber ramp. Vehicles dipping into hole then hitting ramp.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5a, Bath Terrace, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
